items.title: The market’s wobbling. Here are BlackRock’s shields for the biggest risks.
items.description: Here are the hedges the $11 trillion asset manager recommends for the concerns weighing on investor minds.

items.title: Generation Beta is here — and you won’t believe how much today’s newborns will need to retire
items.description: Babies born in 2025 could face a major shortfall in savings in 75 years if things don’t change. Here’s what families can do now to prepare.

items.title: Take these steps to set financial goals for your family in 2025 — and reach them
items.description: How you and your partner can make saving easier, spending harder, and teamwork second nature.

items.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq Futures Edge Higher
items.description: U.S. stock futures rose modestly and European markets made gains.

items.title: ‘I’ve always been very good with money’: Should I put my wife on the title of my home, investment property and my late father’s house?
items.description: “If I die and she sells the properties, would she have to pay a lot of capital-gains taxes, especially on the houses we don’t live in?”
